_header: Adam that is our father by kind
_description: A version of ‘Jesus conditor alme’ — six 8-line stanzas

BodAsh970.First Lines:
Adam that ys ower father be kynde& eue þat ys ower mother
                    also…
BodAsh970.Last Lines:
…ower goostele enemi to withstandesynge we alle in love &
                    charite saluator mundi domine
